visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the following specifications: Chart type: pie, Chart title: 'WEBAIM survey', Subtitle: 'Level of employment', Axes and labels styling: Use Verdana font for all text, with a font size of 12pt for data labels and 1.2em for the title. Colors should be set to #555 for the title and #aa1111 for the focus border. Data series: Include three series with names 'Full time employment', 'Part time employment', and 'Unemployed', with corresponding percentages 40.7%, 13.9%, and 45.4%. Custom colors: None specified. Additional configurations: Enable data labels with a format showing the series name and percentage, and set the focus border style for keyboard navigation.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'pie', and it includes a title 'WEBAIM survey' and a subtitle 'Level of employment'. The text styling for the title and subtitle uses the Verdana font with a size of 1.2em for the title and 12pt for the subtitle, both colored #555. The data labels are enabled and formatted to display the series name and percentage, also styled with Verdana font and 12pt size. The data series includes three categories: 'Full time employment' with 40.7%, 'Part time employment' with 13.9%, and 'Unemployed' with 45.4%. Additionally, accessibility settings are configured for keyboard navigation, with a focus border style set to a line width of 3, color #aa1111, and border radius of 5, with a margin of 4.
